EEGGaming.Core.Managers.BrainWaveRecordManager Class Reference EEGGaming.Core.Managers.BrainWaveRecordManager
The Manager that manages the records of the BrainWave table and detectsif an eye blink occured.

Detailed Description
The Manager that manages the records of the BrainWave table and detectsif an eye blink occured.
